Week 1: 2 x 10* e/s, Rest 45 seconds between sets.
Week 2: 2 x 12* e/s, Rest 45 seconds between sets.
Week 3: 2 x 16* e/s, Rest 45 seconds between sets.
Make it harder: Hold for 3-4 seconds at the top.

Week 1: 3 x 12-15 e/s, Rest 60 seconds between sets.
Week 2: 3 x 12-15** e/s, Rest 60 seconds between sets.
Week 3: 3 x 12-15** e/s, Rest 60 seconds between sets.

Make it easier: Perform in front of a wall to reduce range of motion.
Perform basic reverse crunches or decline reverse crunches.

Week 1: 3 x 60-80 yards e/s, Rest 120 seconds between sets.
Week 2: 3 x 60-80 yards e/s, Rest 90 seconds between sets.
Week 3: 3 x 60-80 yards e/s, Rest 60 seconds between sets.
